cooldown.description: Find out when you can submit again.

howto.description: Print instructions for using the common queue commands.
howto.name: howto

languages.description: Print my core repository's language statistics.

limits.description: Display the song queue's submission limits.
limits.name: limits

nowplaying.description: Reveal the current song in the queue (or my best guess).
nowplaying.name: nowplaying

ping.description: Ping my host server to check latency.
ping.name: ping

setprefix.description: Set the prefix used by message commands.
setprefix.name: setprefix

prefix.description: The new prefix to use before message commands.
prefix.name: prefix

responses.missing-value: Expected a value to set as the command prefix

sr.description: Submit a song to the queue.
sr.name: sr

url.description: A song link from a supported platform
url.name: url

version.description: Display the bot's current codebase version.
version.name: version

video.description: Reply with the video title and duration.
video.name: video
